Deployed and maintained an internal app written in Node.JS which provides seamless collaboration between developers and QAs
Planned and implemented some of the biggest features of FortiSandbox in Django Python
Rapidly improved the performance of search page by redesigning it adopting Kendo UI
Eliminate cost overruns and delays for more than 25 percent by initiating code review between developers
Actively adopting productive open source frameworks such as Vue and Angular to benefit the team
Optimizing SQL query to reduce the loading time for serval pages by up to 80%
Redesigned the entire GUI of FortiSandbox to follow the modern UI trend in a timely manner
Responsible for the design of VM Images module which includes Download/Install/Active published VMs on cluster units
Reduced the loading speed of all dashboard pages from 8 to 3 seconds while implementing responsive design for friendly UX

Created complex business components for Invoice module while migrating and implementing client’s database in a multi-tier environment suitable way to address application infrastructure issues.
Implemented hundreds of enhancements to date and provided creative UX design for Azzier’s front end.
